Schedule highlights ‘indispensable’ role filled by Tairāwhiti rescue helicopter https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/07/schedule-highlights-indispensable-role-filled-by-tairawhiti-rescue-helicopter/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/05/07/schedule-highlights-indispensable-role-filled-by-tairawhiti-rescue-helicopter/ Regional rescue chopper mission schedule similar to during Cyclone Gabrielle. Mon, 06 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 In one of their seven missions for the week the Trust Tairāwhiti Eastland Helicopter Rescue team transferred a patient in serious condition from Gisborne Hospital to Hastings where they were met by Life Flight's Westpac Rescue Helicopter, which continued the transfer to Wellington Hospital.

Far North news in brief: Enchanter trial starts; duck shooting season; and minor crashes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-news-in-brief-enchanter-Trial-duck-shooting-season-and-minor-crashes/PG2VQQW3I5DAZMDWQPUDANDI5A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/far-north-news-in-brief-enchanter-Trial-duck-shooting-season-and-minor-crashes/PG2VQQW3I5DAZMDWQPUDANDI5A/News snippets from the Far North Mon, 06 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The Enchanter fishing boat that capsized off North Cape in March 2022, with the loss of five men. The boat’s skipper, Lance Goodhew, of Coopers Beach, and Enchanter Charters are facing trial in the Whangārei District Court this week over the deaths.
